name: Move or Block
description:
• Title : Move Or Block
  • Description: Electronic board game, the goal is to move the piece to the top right corner before your opponent.
  • How your submission matches the theme: 
    • Moves are purchased from a market both players have access to.
    • Moves will pick up gold needed to purchased moves next turn.
    • Moves will also block your opponent.
  • The platform(s) your game is intended to run on: Windows

Credit: Harrison Thompson
